q: Klunk and Catherine Bodock, media director of Keenan-Nagle Advertising in Allentown, agree that Michael Vick still has a few more dues to pay before deals are struck with big-money companies on the national stage. I'm glad the Eagles hired him, Bodock said. "He deserved a second chance, he did his time. That said, from a marketing perspective, I'm not sure that his image has been repaired enough. Former Republican state Rep. Jackie Walorski , a tea party favorite who narrowly lost her race last year against Democratic Rep. Joe Donnelly in northern Indiana, said she was excited by the prospect of Mike Pence running for governor. I think he's the clear front-runner, and I think the race is his if he chooses to accept it, Jackie Walorski said. "I think he'd clear the field."
